name: Next Star System
storyline: Next Star system is a sci-fi strategic robot battle game. You search a galaxy using your telescope, finding resource-rich star systems. Then dispatch a team of robots, each with it's capabilities and powers. You then deploy them in a planet field, against another player. The aim is to collect some treasures by carrying it toward your base. The first one who collect 3 treasures will win the match. each robot has specific mechanics. some only attack rival robots, some only collect treasure and so on. You have to deploy then in the right time and from right direction to win.
summary: Next Star System is a Sci-Fi strategic robot battle game for mobile devices.
